text: Nikolay Nikitich Slyunkov () (26 April 1929 – 9 August 2022) was a Belarusian politician. He was first secretary of the Communist Party of the Byelorussian SSR during the Soviet Union. Slyunkov died on 9 August 2022 in Minsk, Belarus at the age of 93.Умер бывший глава БССР Николай Слюньков ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belarusian politicians
title: Nikolay Slyunkov
